record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3688, S. 3689, H.R. 6867, AND H.R. 7110
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 3688, S. 3689, H.R. 6867, AND H.R. 7110 -- (Senate - November 17, 2008)

[Page: S10602]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I understand that there are four bills at the desk and I ask for their first reading en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will read the titles of the bills en bloc.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

A bill (S. 3688) to provide for additional emergency unemployment compensation, to amend the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008 to authorize loans to automobile manufacturers and component suppliers, and for other purposes.

A bill (S. 3689) making supplemental appropriations for job creation and preservation, infrastructure investment, and economic and energy assistance for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009, and for other purposes.
A bill (H.R. 6867) to provide for additional emergency unemployment compensation.

A bill (H.R. 7110) making supplemental appropriations for job creation and preservation, infrastructure investment, and economic and energy assistance for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2009, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for a second reading en bloc and object to my own request en bloc.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bills will receive their second reading on the next legislative day.
